3 Times a Week

" Schedule and track your time when cleaning your room, such as it worked best for me and changed my life. Nevertheless, its your choice, do what works best for you. "

Monday, Wednesday and Sunday. 3 perfect days a week ;)

Google Calendar is great for SCHEDULING your week.

The idea is that you focus only a *limited set of time* per day you clean, because that will allow you to mantain correctly your room in order during a extended period of time.

For example: I am used to allow myself ONLY to clean 40 MINUTES per cleaning session.

Toggl App (Free tracking time app)

Here's how you can track the time you spent cleaning.

1) After cleaning, you should input that you spent "X" amount of time doing the activity THAT DAY.

For e.x: I choose to clean my room on Monday, so I make sure that I only order it during 40 MINUTES and when I finish. I enter to my computer or phone and add that I've made 40 minutes of cleaning my room today.

2) At the end of the week, you will see your weekly report- It will show you how much time you spent cleaning your room during your week.
